main event: A round, bright silver object was observed for 15 seconds, hovered, then accelerated out of sight.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on September 7, 1962, at 0720Z., The object was described as one inch in diameter at arm's length., The observation lasted for a total of one minute., The witness considered the sighting credible., The object's course was eastward.
location: Not specified, Not specified, Not specified
